extension.searchTitle: To authorize a comprehensive, strategic approach for United States foreign assistance to developing countries to reduce global poverty and hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition, promote inclusive, sustainable agricultural-led economic growth, improve nutritional outcomes, especially for women and children, build resilience among vulnerable populations, and for other purposes.; Global Food Security Act of 2015;H.R. 1567 (RH)

titleInfo.title: To authorize a comprehensive, strategic approach for United States foreign assistance to developing countries to reduce global poverty and hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition, promote inclusive, sustainable agricultural-led economic growth, improve nutritional outcomes, especially for women and children, build resilience among vulnerable populations, and for other purposes.

extension.action: Additional sponsors: Mr. McGovern, Mr. Emmer of Minnesota, Mr. Meadows, Mr. DesJarlais, Mr. Van Hollen, Ms. Kuster, Mr. Poe of Texas, Mrs. Brooks of Indiana, Ms. Lee, Mr. Kilmer, Mr. Hultgren, Mr. Beyer, Mr. David Scott of Georgia, Mr. King of New York, Mr. Dent, Mr. Trott, Mr. Quigley, Ms. Schakowsky, Mr. Nolan, Mr. Dold, Ms. Jackson Lee, Mr. Perry, Ms. Wasserman Schultz, Mr. McDermott, Mr. Danny K. Davis of Illinois, Mrs. Bustos, Mr. Veasey, Mr. Capuano, Mr. Rush, Mr. Courtney, Mr. Carson of Indiana, Mr. Kennedy, Mr. Sherman, Mr. Hinojosa, Mr. Costello of Pennsylvania, Ms. Eshoo, Mr. Farr, Mr. Lance, Mr. Cramer, Ms. Ros-Lehtinen, Ms. Kelly of Illinois, Mr. Foster, Mr. Neal, Mr. Polis, Mr. Rodney Davis of Illinois, Mr. DeSaulnier, Mr. Lynch, Ms. Fudge, Mr. Ashford, Ms. Plaskett, Mrs. Walorski, Mr. Messer, Mr. Bost, Ms. Adams, Mr. Delaney, Mrs. Wagner, Mr. Lewis, Mr. Kinzinger of Illinois, Ms. Lofgren, Mr. Gutiérrez, Ms. DelBene, Mr. Ribble, Ms. Matsui, Mr. Levin, Mr. Israel, Mr. Shimkus, Ms. Velázquez, Ms. Moore, Mr. Lipinski, Mr. Long, Mr. Walz, Ms. Duckworth, Mr. Ellison, Mrs. Capps, Mr. Vargas, Mr. Kind, Mr. Keating, Mr. Jolly, Mr. Swalwell of California, Mr. Bishop of Michigan, Mr. McCaul, Mr. Serrano, Mr. Honda, Ms. Kaptur, Ms. Roybal-Allard, Mr. Heck of Washington, Mr. Blumenauer, Mr. Rooney of Florida, Ms. Norton, Ms. Jenkins of Kansas, Mr. Cohen, Ms. Titus, Ms. Esty, Ms. Wilson of Florida, Ms. Judy Chu of California, Mr. Huffman, Mr. Hanna, Mr. Sean Patrick Maloney of New York, Mr. Welch, Ms. Pingree, Mr. Ross, Mr. Aguilar, Ms. Graham, Mr. Salmon, Mr. Clawson of Florida, Mrs. Torres, Mr. Rangel, Mr. LoBiondo, Mr. Kline, Mr. Womack, Mr. Zeldin, Mr. Clay, Mr. Rokita, Ms. Edwards, Mr. Bucshon, and Mr. Gibson
Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed

Mr. Smith of New Jersey (for himself, Ms. McCollum, Mr. Royce, Mr. Engel, Mr. Fortenberry, Ms. Bass, Mr. Crenshaw, Ms. DeLauro, Mr. Reichert, Mr. Smith of Washington, Mr. Paulsen, and Mr. Cicilline) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs
